title: Extracting Evidence
label: Feature[Engineering][Program]
remark: The evidence provided by visual communicative signals (such as whether a group of bars is colored differently from the other bars) is automatically extracted from the XML representation of a graphic and entered into evidence nodes

title: Training
label: Reasoning[Summarization][ML]
remark: {It learns to predict the intended message} The conditional probability tables are learned from our corpus of graphics.
